job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Albin Engineering Services, Inc. (www.aesi.com) is looking for a Software Engineer for one of our premier clients in the San Jose, CA area. This is a permanent position with full benefits!
Job Responsibilities:
Design Failure Analysis tools by solving control equipment problems.
Design and test software on Microsoft Windows Environment to control the operation of automated microscope and scanning systems.
Design and implement software for acquiring images from frame-grabber data and camera systems.
Job Requirements:
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or similar.
2+ years experience with Visual Studio
2+ years experience developing in C# and C++ language to develop/debug Windows desktop application.
Knowledge and experience of WPF.
Understanding of Semiconductor devices and software development experience in Microscope and Semiconductor probing tools is highly desirable.
